property.title: Your Perfect Escape
property.description: This luxury guesthouse offers a seasonal outdoor pool with Atlas mountain views for incredible relaxation. Les Jardins Yasmina is a guesthouse located in a natural setting in the Berber countryside on the shores of Lake Bin-el-Ouidane, equipped with Wi-Fi coverage throughout the property. The accommodation has a 24/7 reception. The rooms feature both Berber and modern decor, with views of splendid landscapes.

lake.title: Lake Bin-el-Ouidane
lake.description: Nestled in the heart of the Atlas, Lake Bin el Ouidane is undoubtedly one of the most impressive and beautiful landscapes in Morocco. This vast expanse of water covers nearly 4000 hectares and sits at over 800 meters altitude, making it the highest lake in Africa. Blending the blue of crystalline water, the ochre of surrounding lands and the green of regional olive trees, the landscape of Lake Bin el Ouidane is breathtaking.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our guests say
testimonials.main: A warm welcome, a fantastic room, a splendid setting... A huge breakfast. Everything came together for a great weekend. Thank you for your hospitality and helpfulness. We will definitely return. Excellent value for money. We recommend to everyone!
